item.title: We're launching
item.description:
Launch time

Welcome all the interwebz. I’ve decided for the nth time to start a coding blog. I hope this time I will persist in this endeavor. I plan to write about fun coding stuff.

Few words about me. My name is ≈Åukasz Kwoska. I have been a developer for many years. Mostly mobile developer, but I am interested in all kinds of graphics, audio and algorithmic stuff.
